Interface InputEventListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
IGameController
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController, InputHandlerHarness.RecordingController
public interface InputEventListener
Interface for handling game input events. Defines the contract for responding to player actions.

Input events include:

  • Move down (soft drop)
  • Move left
  • Move right
  • Rotate
  • Instant drop (hard drop)
  • New game
See Also:
  • GameController
  • IGameController
